attributes.action: Say Yes to be a true friend of Israel and no to Palestinian state!
attributes.additional_details: Call for the government to be a true friend of israel as David Cameron said we are and always will be. Please watch this video - it  may be we definitely should not give away any of the land, please let me know if this information is correct - if  so Britain must vote NO to giving away more land. The government of Britain must say NO to forming a Palestinian state in Israel according to the content of this video. www.givepeaceachance.info
